name: Pizza Time (Michael Sim, schemesmith, BlazeBoy13)
description:
Pizza Time
Help Allan make his daily round of deliveries by picking up pizzas and driving them to our loyal customers!

But beware the pizza snatchers. They'll do anything to have a bite.

Developed by Idea Guys Incorporated
Theo Olsen - Programming and Production 
Jimmy Qiu - Programming
Michael Sim - Programming, UI, and Production
Patrick Villegas - Art

Additional Art and Sound Assets from
Kenney Game Assets
DL Sounds

Game developed using Godot 3.2.2 as part of GMTK Game Jam 2020
Originally published on July 12, 2020.
